content: easy and fun amigurumi free amigurumi pattern including video tutorial on youtube perfect for beginners every step is explained in detail in this video tutorial axl the fox is a small project you can make one in 2-3 hours i used catania yarn but you can make this with any yarn link to free pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-fox-crochet-pattern/ https //www youtube com/watch v=lrjkoxvzrh4&t=2s
